text: Interested in custom mechanical keyboards but not sure where to begin?
We've got you covered with a beginner-friendly guide.
Discover the essential components like switches,
keycaps, and layouts and see how they influence feel and sound.
Learn about keyboard sizes to match your taste and dive into keycap profiles and materials.
Unravel the mystery of switch types, linear, tactile, and clicky to find your perfect fit.
To explore building your own budget-friendly custom keyboard,
read the full article for more information.
